title: Apple MacBook Air 2018 review: premium economy
description: Apple has finally redesigned the MacBook Air with a retina display. Starting at $1199, it has a tapered design, it's super thin, and pretty light. The new MacBook Air includes all the features youd expect from a modern laptop  like Touch ID, louder speakers, and a big touchpad. But, its an Air so dont expect the same performance you would get from a Pro, though it is much faster and a solid upgrade from the previous MacBook Air model.  Subscribe:   Here's a link to buy the MacBook Air:   Note: we sometimes place affiliate links directly to the best deals in our video descriptions, so we may earn a commission if you buy something.
